verses.verse: The <S%H4853>burden<s%> of <S%H1834>Damascus:<s%> <S%H1834>"Behold,<s%> Damascus is taken <S%H5493>away<s%> from being a <S%H5892>city,<s%> and it will be a <S%H4654>ruinous<s%> <S%H4596>heap.<s%>
The <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H6177>Aroer<s%> are <S%H5800>forsaken.<s%> They will be for <S%H5739>flocks,<s%> which shall lie <S%H7257>down,<s%> and none shall make them <S%H2729>afraid.<s%>

The <S%H4013>fortress<s%> shall <S%H7673>cease<s%> from <S%H669>Ephraim,<s%> and the <S%H4467>kingdom<s%> from <S%H1834>Damascus,<s%> and the <S%H7605>remnant<s%> of <S%H758>Syria.<s%> They will be as the <S%H3519>glory<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%>" <S%H5002>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies.<s%>

"It will happen in that <S%H3117>day<s%> that the <S%H3519>glory<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> will be made <S%H1809>thin,<s%> and the <S%H4924>fatness<s%> of his <S%H1320>flesh<s%> will become <S%H7329>lean.<s%>

It will be like when the <S%H7105>harvester<s%> <S%H622>gathers<s%> the <S%H7054>wheat,<s%> and his <S%H2220>arm<s%> <S%H7114>reaps<s%> the <S%H7641>grain.<s%> <S%H3950>Yes,<s%> it will be like when one gleans <S%H7641>grain<s%> in the <S%H6010>valley<s%> of <S%H7497>Rephaim.<s%>

Yet <S%H5955>gleanings<s%> will be <S%H7604>left<s%> <S%H5363>there,<s%> like the shaking of an olive <S%H2132>tree,<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> or <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H1620>olives<s%> in the <S%H7218>top<s%> of the uppermost <S%H534>bough,<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> or <S%H2568>five<s%> in the outermost <S%H5585>branches<s%> of a <S%H6509>fruitful<s%> <S%H5002>tree,<s%>" says <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

In that <S%H3117>day,<s%> <S%H120>people<s%> will <S%H8159>look<s%> to their <S%H6213>Maker,<s%> and their <S%H5869>eyes<s%> will have <S%H7200>respect<s%> for the <S%H6918>Holy<s%> One of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

They will not <S%H8159>look<s%> to the <S%H4196>altars,<s%> the <S%H4639>work<s%> of their <S%H3027>hands;<s%> neither shall they <S%H7200>respect<s%> that which their <S%H676>fingers<s%> have <S%H6213>made,<s%> either the <S%H842>Asherim,<s%> or the incense <S%H2553>altars.<s%>

In that <S%H3117>day,<s%> their <S%H4581>strong<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> will be like the <S%H5800>forsaken<s%> <S%H2793>places<s%> in the <S%H534>woods<s%> and on the mountain <S%H6440>top,<s%> which were <S%H5800>forsaken<s%> from before the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> and it will be a <S%H8077>desolation.<s%>

For you have <S%H7911>forgotten<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of your <S%H3468>salvation,<s%> and have not <S%H2142>remembered<s%> the <S%H6697>rock<s%> of your <S%H4581>strength.<s%> Therefore you <S%H5193>plant<s%> <S%H5282>pleasant<s%> <S%H5194>plants,<s%> and <S%H2232>set<s%> out <S%H2114>foreign<s%> <S%H2156>seedlings.<s%>

In the <S%H3117>day<s%> of your <S%H5194>planting,<s%> you <S%H7735>hedge<s%> it <S%H1242>in.<s%> In the morning, you make your <S%H2233>seed<s%> <S%H6524>blossom,<s%> but the <S%H7105>harvest<s%> flees <S%H5067>away<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H2470>grief<s%> and of <S%H605>desperate<s%> <S%H3511>sorrow.<s%>

<S%H1945>Ah,<s%> the <S%H1995>uproar<s%> of <S%H1995>many<s%> <S%H5971>peoples,<s%> who <S%H1993>roar<s%> like the <S%H1993>roaring<s%> of the <S%H3220>seas;<s%> and the <S%H7588>rushing<s%> of <S%H3816>nations,<s%> that rush like the <S%H7582>rushing<s%> of <S%H3524>mighty<s%> <S%H4325>waters!<s%>

The <S%H3816>nations<s%> will <S%H7582>rush<s%> like the <S%H7588>rushing<s%> of <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H4325>waters:<s%> but he will <S%H1605>rebuke<s%> <S%H5127>them,<s%> and they will flee far <S%H4801>off,<s%> and will be <S%H7291>chased<s%> like the <S%H4671>chaff<s%> of the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H7307>wind,<s%> and like the whirling <S%H1534>dust<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H5492>storm.<s%>

At <S%H6256>evening,<s%> <S%H1091>behold,<s%> terror! Before the <S%H1242>morning,<s%> they are no <S%H2506>more.<s%> This is the portion of those who <S%H8154>plunder<s%> <S%H1486>us,<s%> and the lot of those who rob <S%H962>us.<s%>
